home.headline: Cloud Advocate and Instructor
home.subline: I'm Franck, a Cloud Advocate at CLOUDCRAFTWITHFRANCK, where I craft cloud solutions for engineers. After hours, I build my own projects.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Franck Kengne is a US-based Cloud Advocate with a passion for transforming complex cloud challenges into simple, and straightforward solutions. His work spans cloud challenges, problem solving, and critical thinking as well as interviews in cloud technology.

CSE.achievements: Redesigned, architected and managed Microsoft PowerApps solutions in enterprise Azure environments, integrating custom APIs, automation workflows, and complex logic apps

The OpenNMS Group.achievements: Developed a Proficient in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform, automating infrastructure provisioning and configuration for both on-premises and cloud environments.

Azure.description: Able to configure, deploy, and manage any azure service.

Terraform.description: Building scalable infrastructure using terraform is my passion.
